PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-06112013-05-30,  ,  ,  PS,  CBSA, 
ActCustoms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Accounting for Imported Goods and Payment of Duties Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the ACCOUNTING FOR IMPORTED GOODS AND PAYMENT OF DUTIES REGULATIONS in order to expand requirements that an importer must meet in order to receive an authorization to participate in the Custom Self-Assessment program to include importers who are residents of the U.S. and Canada that have their head office in the U.S. or operate a branch office in the U.S.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0116 Publication Date: 2013-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
